data.enText: to order sb not to do sth; to order that sth must not be done

data.chText: 他不准他们再提到这个问题。
data.enText: He forbade them from mentioning the subject again.

data.chText: 她的父亲不允许这桩婚事。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: You are all forbidden to leave.

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+名词短语

data.enText: My doctor has forbidden me sugar.
to make it difficult or impossible to do sth

data.chText: 由于篇幅所限，这里不能深入阐述这个问题。
data.enText: Lack of space forbids further treatment of the topic here.

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: used to say that you hope that sth will not happen

data.chText: “也许你会像我一样，最终成为律师。”“但愿不会这样！”
data.enText: ‘Maybe you'll end up as a lawyer, like me.’ ‘God forbid!’

data.text: Some people find this use offensive.
有人认为此用法含冒犯意。

ex.chText: 我妈妈不准我玩电脑游戏。
ex.enText: My mum forbade me to play computer games.

ex.chText: 法律严格禁止种族歧视。
ex.enText: The law strictly forbids racial discrimination.

synonyms.bx: 指通过下命令、制定规则等禁止某事，或禁止某人做某事。

ex.enText: Gambling is banned in this country.

ex.chText: 为什么他被禁止驾车两年？
ex.enText: Why has he been banned from driving for two years?

synonyms.bx: 强调不可抗拒性，语气较强。

ex.enText: He was barred from leaving the country.

ex.chText: 夜里11点之后运动员不得外出。
ex.enText: The players are barred from going out after 11 pm.

synonyms.bx: 指正式禁止某人出入某地或做某事。

ex.chText: 他被禁止使用这则广告。
ex.enText: He was enjoined from using this advertisement.

synonyms.bx: 法律术语，指通过发出禁令等禁止某人做某事。

ex.enText: Students are prohibited from smoking on campus.

ex.chText: 永远不要做法律禁止的事情。
ex.enText: Never do what is prohibited by law.

synonyms.bx: 尤指以法令禁止做某事或使用某物，通常用被动语态。

data.enText: used to say that you hope that sth will not happen

data.chText: “也许你会像我一样，最终成为律师。”“但愿不会这样！”
data.enText: ‘Maybe you'll end up as a lawyer, like me.’ ‘God forbid!’

data.text: Some people find this use offensive.
有人认为此用法含冒犯意。

example: I forbid you to call me late at night
Mother vetoed the trip to the chocolate store
My sense of tact forbids an honest answer
Your role in the projects precludes your involvement in the competitive project

value.def: If you forbid someone to do something, or if you forbid an activity, you order that it must not be done.

example.ex: She was shut away and forbidden to read...
example.tran: 她被关了起来，并且不允许看书。

example.ex: Brazil's constitution forbids the military use of nuclear energy.
example.tran: 巴西的宪法禁止将核能用于军事用途。

value.def: If something forbids a particular course of action or state of affairs, it makes it impossible for the course of action or state of affairs to happen.

example.ex: His own pride forbids him to ask Arthur's help...
example.tran: 他的自尊心不允许他开口向阿瑟求助。
传统习惯阻碍着现代化的进程。

trans: 但愿不会这样;千万不要这样;苍天不容;老天不许
愿上帝阻止这样的事情
